of carousels created using custom module Created Cron jobs to automatically execute some functions every hour Also updated the node fields automatically as required Worked on exporting and importing dev database once a day with SQLPro and Drush Developed custom module like QLform which is used to create different kinds of forms throughout the site using render arrays Used jQuery for fancy clientside form validations to save server resources Worked with Slick library for creating different kinds of carousels for site Also tested the functionality of developed modules and UI across
